segments.text: I heard a rumor this morning ... It seems Trusten Tools is going out of business.Another competitor is going bankrupt.That could be good news for us .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think you must have heard wrong.The truth is we are going to be taken over by Trusten.We are being bought out , and our company will be merging with our largest competitor.It ' s not good news at all ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What ? We are merging with Trusten ? I never thought that would happen.Will we be getting new owners ? Will it affect our jobs ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Probably.The new owners will be coming to start alignment meetings nextweek.One of the big question is what to call the new conglomerate company .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wow , with such a big change.We won't have the same name ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's not only the name of our company that will change ... I expect that after this acquisition , there'll be a ton of things up in the air .
segments.speaker: S2
